attributes.action: Exempt preserved railway lines from Carbon Emission legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Preserved Railways are a vital part of the national toruism industry and most operate either steam traction built between the 1830s and 1960s or diesel traction built between the 1950s and late 1980s. These were built at a time when CO2 emmissions were unknown and as such they should not be subject to "green" laws
